title: Google Launches DBSC Open Beta in Chrome and Enhances Patch Transparency via Project Zero
description: Google has announced that it's making a security feature called Device Bound Session Credentials (DBSC) in open beta to ensure that users are safeguarded against session cookie theft attacks.
